item.title: Scope Ratings称，金融危机是美国贸易战的一种情形
item.description: 范围评级公司（Scope Ratings）称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战可能已经造成了持续的经济损失，并仍有可能导致金融危机。【原文：US President Donald Trump’s trade war may have already inflicted persisting economic damage and could still lead to a financial crisis, according to Scope Ratings.】

item.title: ADM 退出中国国内农作物贸易，全球裁员再添一员
item.description: 全球最大的农作物贸易商之一 Archer-Daniels-Midland Co.公司正在收缩其在中国的业务，这是继利润下滑和会计丑闻之后全公司重组努力的一部分。【原文：Archer-Daniels-Midland Co., one of the world’s largest crop traders, is shrinking its operations in China as part of a company-wide restructuring effort following a downturn in profits and a bruising accounting scandal.】

item.title: IDC 称苹果为应对关税将 iPhone 出货量提高 10
item.description: 根据行业跟踪机构 IDC 的数据，苹果公司第一季度的 iPhone 出货量激增 10%，这是苹果公司为加快交付速度和避免对中国征收关税所做努力的一部分。【原文：Apple Inc.’s iPhone unit shipments surged 10% in the first quarter as part of an effort to accelerate deliveries and avoid expected tariffs on China, according to industry tracker IDC.】

item.title: 房利美将特朗普的重要盟友马利克纳入董事会，普尔特说
item.description: 联邦住房金融局局长比尔-普尔特（Bill Pulte）在 X 网站上发表文章称，1789 Capital 的联合创始人奥米德-马利克（Omeed Malik）将加入抵押贷款巨头房利美的董事会。【原文：Omeed Malik, a co-founder of 1789 Capital, is joining the board of mortgage giant Fannie Mae, Federal Housing Finance Agency Director Bill Pulte said in a post on X.】

item.title: 英伟达称将在美国建造高达 5000 亿美元的人工智能设备
item.description: 在人工智能模型芯片领域占据主导地位的英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.【原文：Nvidia Corp., the dominant player in chips for AI models, said it will produce as much as half a trillion dollars’ worth of AI infrastructure in the US over the next four years through manufacturing partnerships.】

item.title: 意大利隐秘的航运大亨因新港口交易而备受瞩目
item.description: 创建地中海航运公司（MSC Mediterranean Shipping Co SA）的意大利亿万富翁詹路易吉-阿庞特（Gianluigi Aponte）行事神秘，在与香港富豪李嘉诚达成的价值 190 亿美元的港口交易中，他已成为一名强有力的经纪人。【原文：Gianluigi Aponte, the secretive Italian billionaire who founded MSC Mediterranean Shipping Co SA, has emerged as a powerful broker in a $19 billion port deal with Hong Kong tycoon Li Ka-shing.】

item.title: KKR 将以 31 亿美元收购交易后服务公司 OSTTRA
item.description: 收购公司 KKR & Co. 同意以 31 亿美元的企业估值收购交易后服务提供商 OSTTRA，这表明抗关税的公司仍然可以出售。【原文：Buyout firm KKR & Co. agreed to acquire post-trade services provider OSTTRA at an enterprise valuation of $3.1 billion, showing that tariff-resilient companies can still be sold.】

item.title: 错得离谱 "的股票预测者难以看透贸易乱局
item.description: 今年，华尔街的主要预测者们都被打脸了，很多人都被证明，唐纳德-特朗普总统好斗的贸易政策将对股市造成的损害是错误的。【原文：Wall Street’s leading prognosticators have been humbled this year, with so many proven wrong about the damage President Donald Trump’s combative trade policies would do to the stock market.】

item.title: 为医院服务的肾脏护理提供商 DaVita 遭勒索软件攻击
item.description: 达维塔公司（DaVita Inc.【原文：DaVita Inc. said it has been impacted by ransomware that had locked down parts of its network.】

item.title: 在贸易摩擦中，养老金会议从美国迁往加拿大
item.description: 一家为加拿大养老金官员举办年度活动的非营利组织决定将今年的活动从圣地亚哥迁往加拿大。【原文：A nonprofit that holds an annual event for Canadian pension officials has decided to relocate this year’s event from San Diego to Canada.】

item.title: 瑞银称美联储介入前信贷市场仍有一段路要走
item.description: 瑞银集团称，本月信贷息差大幅扩大，但仍远未达到迫使美联储介入的水平。【原文：Credit spreads have widened significantly this month but they remain far from levels that would compel the Federal Reserve to step in, according to UBS.】

item.title: Amundi 认为，如果 10 年期债券收益率超过 5%，美联储将启动债券购买计划
item.description: 欧洲最大资产管理公司 Amundi 的首席投资官表示，如果 10 年期国债收益率突破 5%的关键关口，美联储将对国债市场进行干预，并有可能在今年晚些时候推出全面的债券购买计划。【原文：The Federal Reserve will intervene in Treasury markets should 10-year yields rise past the key 5% mark, with a full-fledged bond-buying program likely later this year, according to the chief investment officer of Europe’s largest asset manager Amundi.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会反垄断审判启动，Meta 面临解体可能
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会终于迎来了与 Meta Platforms 公司对簿公堂的一天，认为该公司在十多年前收购 Instagram 和 WhatsApp 后非法垄断了社交媒体市场，必须将其解散。【原文：The US Federal Trade Commission is finally having its day in court against Meta Platforms Inc., arguing that the company must be broken up for illegally monopolizing the social media market after buying Instagram and WhatsApp more than a decade ago.】

item.title: 习近平寻求加强地区关系，中越签署 45 项协议
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平在今年的首次出访中旨在加强与东南亚地区的关系，在此次国事访问期间，中国和越南签署了数十项合作协议。【原文：China and Vietnam signed dozens of cooperation agreements during a state visit by Chinese President Xi Jinping, as he aimed to strengthen ties in Southeast Asia on his first overseas trip of the year.】

item.title: 亿万富翁 Economou 寻求取代 Trafigura 成为意大利顶级炼油厂的合作伙伴
item.description: 意大利最大炼油厂的主要投资者正在寻找贸易公司，以取代 Trafigura 集团成为该厂的供应合作伙伴。【原文：The main investor in Italy’s biggest oil refinery is sounding out trading firms to replace Trafigura Group as the plant’s supply partner.】

item.title: 袜子分类真空吸尘器表明家用机器人尚处于早期阶段
item.description:
Roborock售价1,900美元的真空吸尘器存在诸多限制，但它让我们看到了家用机器人的发展方向。【原文：

Roborock’s $1,900 vacuum cleaner is saddled with limitations, but it offers a glimpse at where home robots are headed.

】

item.title: 哈塞特 "100%不 "预计今年美国经济衰退
item.description: 白宫国家经济委员会主任凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）驳斥了今年经济衰退迫在眉睫的说法，反驳了华尔街一些关于唐纳德-特朗普总统大幅提高关税将导致经济衰退的预测。【原文：White House National Economic Council Director Kevin Hassett dismissed the idea of a recession looming this year, countering some Wall Street forecasts of an economic downturn resulting from the steep tariff hikes being imposed by President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 政变领导人赢得总统选举后加蓬欧洲债券反弹
item.description: 布里斯-奥利吉-恩圭马（Brice Oligui Nguema）在两年前的政变中夺取政权后赢得了加蓬的首次总统选举，此后加蓬的欧元债券在新兴市场中表现最佳。【原文：Gabon’s eurobonds were among the top performers in emerging markets after Brice Oligui Nguema won the country’s first presidential election since he seized power in a coup two years ago.】

item.title: 南非政治风险溢价降低，兰特上涨
item.description: 周末有报道称，南非执政联盟的裂痕有望得到消除，此后兰特引领新兴市场货币兑美元汇率上涨。【原文：The rand led emerging-market currency gains against the faltering dollar after weekend reports raised hopes that a rift in South Africa’s governing coalition will be ironed out.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税政策纠缠不清，谈判代表排起长队，制造混乱
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）对智能手机和其他科技产品不征收关税，给企业和贸易伙伴带来了越来越多的混乱信号，他们正在消化如何与白宫打交道的问题，白宫仍承诺将通过谈判达成数十项对美国有利的新协议。【原文：President Donald Trump’s tariff exclusions for smartphones and other tech products have added to a growing set of confusing signals for companies and trading partners digesting how to engage a White House still promising to negotiate dozens of new deals in America’s favor.】

item.title: 耶伦称国债显示美国信心丧失而非机能失调
item.description: 前财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）表示，最近的国债大跌预示着人们对美国决策的信心下降，令人担忧，而不是需要美联储干预的功能失调事件。【原文：Former Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said that the recent selloff in Treasuries signaled a worrying drop in confidence in American policymaking, rather than a dysfunctional event that warrants Federal Reserve intervention.】

item.title: 俄罗斯能源计划预计到 2050 年原油产量变化不大
item.description: 根据俄罗斯新的长期能源战略，未来 25 年内原油生产和出口几乎不会发生变化。【原文：Russia’s new long-term energy strategy sees crude-oil production and exports barely changing over the next 25 years.】

item.title: 在华尔街动荡不安的一周里，策略买入了更多比特币
item.description: 迈克尔-赛勒的 "战略 "利用上周公司普通股价格的大幅波动，又购买了 2.858 亿美元的比特币。【原文：Michael Saylor’s Strategy took advantage of the large price swings in the company’s common shares last week to purchase $285.8 million more of Bitcoin.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）达成协议，取消外汇管制，阿根廷资产大涨
item.description: 作为与国际货币基金组织签订的 200 亿美元新计划的一部分，阿根廷取消了大部分资本管制，此后该国资产跳涨。【原文：Argentina assets jumped after the country lifted most of its capital controls as part of its new $20 billion program with the International Monetary Fund.】

item.title: 摩根士丹利财报后启动银行债券发行
item.description: 摩根士丹利周一公布第一季度财报后，成为华尔街六大银行中首家出售美国投资级债券的公司。【原文：Morgan Stanley is the first of the six biggest banks on Wall Street to sell US investment-grade bonds Monday after reporting first-quarter earnings.】

item.title: 科斯拉（Khosla）支持的能源初创公司获得 2.58 亿美元资金，帮助为数据中心供电
item.description:

Mainspring Energy’s generators are able to run on different types of gas, including carbon-free hydrogen.

】

item.title: 欧佩克在贸易战中下调今明两年石油需求预测
item.description: 欧佩克下调了今明两年全球石油需求增长预测，因为唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税攻势对石油消费造成了影响。【原文：OPEC cut forecasts for global oil demand growth this year and next as President Donald Trump’s tariff onslaught takes a toll on consumption.】

item.title: Kraken 与 Alpaca 建立股票和 ETF 交易合作关系，将业务拓展至加密货币之外
item.description: 计划于明年初上市的加密货币交易所 Kraken 通过与经纪商合作，将业务范围扩展到数字资产之外，并开始交易美国股票和交易所交易基金。【原文：Crypto exchange Kraken, which is planning to go public early next year, has expanded beyond digital assets and into trading of US stocks and exchange-traded funds through a brokerage partnership.】
